page.title: 11Yorkshire Imperial II
page.content: (continued) There is a large fleet of {commercial vehicles}which delivers finished goods to customers and also collects materials from suppliers. There is also a large{garage}with a staff of skilled{mechanics}who repair and service the lorries and vans, sales representatives' cars and so on. The{raw materials}used by the Alloys and Fittings divisions come from all over the world and include {copper, zinc, nickel}and numerous other metals which, when mixed in various combinations, result in alloys with high corrosion resistance, special heat-transfer properties, etc. The employees at the Leeds site join together in their leisure time for all sorts of team and individual {sporting activities.}Whole families take part in some events.
